info.title: DCOM Rule Engine  API
info.description:
This is the API that is  implemented by a DCOM Rule Engine to connect to it.
version: '1.0.0'

authService.name: Authorization
authService.description: A bearer token to identify the connecting service as an authorizied software tool accredited to provide compliance data

authUser.name: Authorization
authUser.description: A bearer token to identify the connecting user.  Acquired from the OAUTH2 Security Service related to this service.

get.summary: Retrieves the basic metadata about the Rule Engine
get.description: Retrieves the basic metadata about the Rule Engine

200.description: Returns basic metadata about the Rule Engine. Equivalent XML Response is returned if content type is set appropriately.
Returns a GUID for the compliance check

get.summary: Returns an overview of the project entities that the rule engine is aware of and the data required for them
get.description: Returns an overview of the project entities that the rule engine is aware of and the data required for them

200.description: Returns the set of entities and the data required for them

idSet.description: The set of IDs the rule engine is currently utilising

conditions.description: A set of conditions for the approval submitted to the rule engine.

approval.description: The overall approval status of this application

log.description: A set of logs describing the process of this application.

messages.description: A set of messages lodges about this application.

securityServiceType.description: The type of authorisation/authentication service used by this rule engine

securityServiceURI.description: The URL of the OAUTH2 security service utilised by this rule engine

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

post.summary: Updates the ID Set used within the Rule Engine
post.description: Updates the ID used within the Rule Engine

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

ids.description: A list of entity IDs available on the connecting data source.

post.summary: Enables the submission of answers to compliance questions to the rule engine
post.description: Enables the submission of answers to compliance questions to the rule engine

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

answers.description: A set of answers submitted to the rule engine.

post.summary: Enables the signalling of approval (or not) and the transmission of associated conditions with an approval to the rule engine for onward transmission to the result service.
post.description: Enables the signalling of approval (or not) and the transmission of associated conditions with an approval to the rule engine for onward transmission to the result service.

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

conditions.description: A set of conditions for the approval submitted to the rule engine.

approval.description: The overall approval status of this application (if changed)

put.summary: Enables the sending of a message to the other parties in the compliance checking process
put.description: Enables the sending of a message to the other parties in the compliance checking process

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

post.summary: Enables the submission of compliance data to the rule engine to the implementing service.
post.description: Enables the submission of compliance data to the rule engine to the implementing service.

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

dataItems.description: A set of data submitted to the rule engine.

get.summary: Retrieves feedback on a given entity
get.description: Retrieves feedback on a given entity

200.description: returns a set of feedback on the request element/clause

properties.description: The list of properties of the give entity that have compliance results

complianceResults.description: A set of compliance results for this entity grouped by properties (as per the order in in the properties field)

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the entity about which feedback is requested.

get.summary: Retrieves feedback on a given clause
get.description: Retrieves feedback on a given clause

200.description: returns a set of feedback on the request element/clause

entities.description: A set of entity IDs that have results applicable to this clause

complianceResults.description: A set of compliance results grouped by entities (as per the order in in the entities field)

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

parameters.name: clauseId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the clauseÂ§ about which feedback is requested.

get.summary: Enables the retrieval of a BCF File documenting any issues identified by the rule engine as part of the checking process
get.description: Enables the retrieval of a BCF File documenting any issues identified by the rule engine as part of the checking process

200.description: Returns a BCFzip File as described here

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

get.summary: Returns a list of all compliance results from a given compliance check
get.description: Returns a list of all compliance results from a given compliance check

200.description: Returns a list of Compliance Results. Equivalent XML Response is returned if content type is set appropriately.

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of the compliance check being considered

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A free text search field to search results

post.summary: Enables the submission of compliance results to the rule engine. This is used for the manual specification of top level results where automated computation is not possible
post.description: Enables the submission of compliance results to the rule engine. This is used for the manual specification of top level results where automated computation is not possible

parameters.name: complianceCheckUID
parameters.description: The Unique ID of a given compliance check

dataItems.description: A set of results submitted to the rule engine.

ServerIdentity.title: Represents the basic metadata of the rule engine
ServerIdentity.description: Represents the basic metadata of the rule engine

name.description: The name of this rule engine

description.description: The description of this rule engine

operator.description: The name of the organisation operating this rule engine

IDSet.title: A Set of IDs of available entities
IDSet.description: Represents a set of entity IDs and their associated metadata

friendlyName.description: A friendly name to represent the object

keyVariables.description: A list of key data items for this entity that the rule engine thinks the connecting data source needs to be aware of in order to contextualise itself

requiredData.description: A list of data required by the rule engine about this entity. This can either be a request for data or a request to answer a question

id.description: An ID of this data item to be used when sending its result back to the rule engine

propertyName.description: The name of the property that we wish to retrieve

unit.description: The unit requested - defaults to unitless if absent

complianceDocumentReference.description: The URI of the clause within a compliance document that this result is generated from

InitialisationData.title: A Set of Metadata required to initalise a compliance check
InitialisationData.description: Represents a set of metadata to initialise the compliance check

lifecyclestage.description: The project lifecycle stage of this check. Taken from the RIBA2020/CIC plan of work - here.

projectSecurityServiceType.description: The type of authorisation/authentication service used by this project

projectSecurityServiceURI.description: The URL of the OAUTH2 security service utilised by this project

complianceDocumentReference.description: The URI of the clause within a compliance document that is used for this compliance check

modelServerType.description: A textual identifcation of the type of model server being utilised.

modelServerURL.description: A URI to access a model on a model server. This is passed to building control to allow model access.

UPRN.description: The UPRN of the building being considered - as described here

regulatorIdentification.description: A reference to the regulatory body that should assess this check, or blank if it is not for external assessment

individuals.description: A set of individuals involved in the compliance check

address.description: The address where the work is to be carried out

postcode.description: The postcode where the work is to be carried out

description.description: A full description of the work

presentUse.description: The present use of the building

proposedUse.description: The proposed use of the building

fireSafetyOrder.description: In scope of Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005

consentToExtension.description: Does applicant consent to extension of proscribed period

consentToConditions.description: Does applicant consent to conditions being applied

electricalSafetyConfirmation.description: Will any electrical installation work be designed, constructed, inspected and tested in accordance with BS7671 or will it be undertaken by an electrician registered with a competent persons scheme?

Answer.title: An answers to questions posed by the rule engine
Answer.description: Represents an answer to questions posed by the rule engine

propertyId.description: The id of the property being answered

id.description: The Entity ID to which this answer is relevant

missValue.description: The optional miss value. This is an indication, if the answer is false, how far out of tolerance the value is.

supportingFileData.description: The BASE64 Encoded File Data that supports/evidences this answer

supportingFileContentType.description: The MIME Content Type of the Support file data (if present)

DataItem.title: A Data Item returned in response to requests from the rule engine
DataItem.description: Represents a  data item returned in response to requests from the rule engine

propertyId.description: The id of the property being answered

id.description: The Entity ID to which this data item is relevant

ComplianceResultDataItem.Name: The a result from a compliance check
ComplianceResultDataItem.description: Represents an individual result from a compliance check

reference.description: Either the clause reference or the property reference depending on the context the reuslt is retrieved

time.description: The date/time that this result was generated

reasons.description: A set of reasons why this result has been computed this includes information on what data items have been used, what software tools produced this results, if the result was automatically or human generated etc...

attributation.description: A string describing what/who generated this result

result.description: The result that has been computed

supportingFileData.description: The BASE64 Encoded File Data that supports/evidences this answer

supportingFileContentType.description: The MIME Content Type of the Support file data (if present)

ComplianceResultSubmission.Name: The Submission of a result of a clause
ComplianceResultSubmission.description: The Submission of a result of a clause

complianceDocumentReference.description: The URI of the clause within a compliance document that this result is generated from

reasons.description: A set of reasons why this result has been computed this includes information on what data items have been used, what software tools produced this results, if the result was automatically or human generated etc...

result.description: The result that has been computed

supportingFileData.description: The BASE64 Encoded File Data that supports/evidences this answer

supportingFileContentType.description: The MIME Content Type of the Support file data (if present)

Individual.Name: The Information Related to an individual named on a building regulations application
Individual.description: The Information Related to an individual named on a building regulations application
